scripts.backend-build: tsc -p src/backend && webpack --config backend-webpack.config.js && webpack && webpack --config serverAdmin-webpack.config.js
scripts.backend-build-serve: tsc -p src/backend && webpack --config backend-webpack.config.js && webpack --config serverAdmin-webpack.config.js && node dist/backend/backend.js
scripts.build-dev-de: ng build --base-href=/mytbdev/de/ --target=production --environment=dev --aot true --app=frontend --output-path dist/mytbdev/de --locale de --i18n-format xlf --i18n-file src/frontend/locales/messages.de.xlf
scripts.build-dev-en: ng build --base-href=/mytbdev/en/ --target=production --environment=dev --aot true --app=frontend --output-path dist/mytbdev/en --locale en --i18n-format xlf --i18n-file src/frontend/locales/messages.en.xlf
scripts.build-beta-de: ng build --base-href=/mytbbeta/de/ --target=production --environment=beta --aot true --app=frontend --output-path dist/mytbbeta/de --locale de --i18n-format xlf --i18n-file src/frontend/locales/messages.de.xlf
scripts.build-beta-en: ng build --base-href=/mytbbeta/en/ --target=production --environment=beta --aot true --app=frontend --output-path dist/mytbbeta/en --locale en --i18n-format xlf --i18n-file src/frontend/locales/messages.en.xlf
scripts.build-prod-de: ng build --base-href=/mytb/de/ --target=production --environment=prod --aot true --app=frontend --output-path dist/mytb/de --locale de --i18n-format xlf --i18n-file src/frontend/locales/messages.de.xlf
scripts.build-prod-en: ng build --base-href=/mytb/en/ --target=production --environment=prod --aot true --app=frontend --output-path dist/mytb/en --locale en --i18n-format xlf --i18n-file src/frontend/locales/messages.en.xlf
scripts.generate-sitemaps: node dist/backend/serverAdmin.js --command generateSitemap config/sitemap-de.json && node dist/backend/serverAdmin.js --command generateSitemap config/sitemap-en.json
scripts.prepare-dev: npm run build-dev-de && npm run build-dev-en
scripts.prepare-beta: npm run build-beta-de && npm run build-beta-en
scripts.prepare-prod: npm run build-prod-de && npm run build-prod-en
scripts.start: ng serve --app=frontend --watch --aot true --locale de --i18n-format xlf --i18n-file src/frontend/locales/messages.de.xlf
scripts.start-en: ng serve --app=frontend --watch --aot true --locale en --i18n-format xlf --i18n-file src/frontend/locales/messages.en.xlf
scripts.xi18n: ng xi18n --locale de --out-file messages.de.xlf --app=frontend --output-path src/frontend/locales/ --i18n-format xlf --verbose --progress
scripts.xi18n-en: ng xi18n --locale en --out-file messages.en.xlf --app=frontend --output-path src/frontend/locales/ --i18n-format xlf --verbose --progress
